message.content:
<<<api>>>: StringTokenizer.nextToken
<<<code>>>: 
```java
import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Collections;
import java.util.HashMap;
import java.util.StringTokenizer;

public class pring {
    public static final String FILE_LOCATION = "C:/Users/DfroJaCk DB/Desktop/zongrecv.txt";

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        BufferedReader in = null;
        ArrayList<String> al = new ArrayList<String>();
        HashMap<String, ArrayList<String>> map = new HashMap<String, ArrayList<String>>();
        try {
            in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(FILE_LOCATION));
            String line;
            while ((line = in.readLine()) != null) {
                String[] splitLine = line.split("SRC:");
                for (int i = 0; i < splitLine.length; i++) {
                    StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(splitLine[i], "|");
                    while (st.hasMoreTokens()) {
                        String token = st.nextToken();
                        if (token.startsWith("923")) {
                            if (!map.containsKey(token)) {
                                map.put(token, new ArrayList<String>());
                            }
                            while (st.hasMoreTokens()) {
                                String nextToken = st.nextToken();
                                if (nextToken.startsWith("ADD")) {
                                    map.get(token).add(nextToken.split("ADD")[1].trim());
                                }
                            }
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        } catch (FileNotFoundException fnfe) {
            fnfe.printStackTrace();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        }

        for (String key : map.keySet()) {
            System.out.println("Contact: " + key);
            for (String content : map.get(key)) {
                System.out.println("Content: " + content);
            }
        }
    }
}
```
<<<explanation>>>: The code reads the file line by line and splits each line by "SRC:". Then it tokenizes each split line by "|". If the token starts with "923", it is considered as a contact number and added to a HashMap if it's not already present. The HashMap's key is the contact number and the value is an ArrayList of contents. If the token starts with "ADD", it is considered as content and added to the ArrayList corresponding to the current contact number. Finally, it prints out each contact number and its corresponding contents.
